system_description: ContosoShop – React SPA front-end with REST API in Azure App Service + SQL back-end + Service Bus for transaction decoupling.
issue_summary: Checkout process intermittently fails with 'Order submission error' for multiple users.

conversation_history.message: Several customers have reported that they get an 'Order submission error' when trying to complete their purchase. This started around 11:00 PM UTC.
Thank you for reporting this, Jordan. Can you confirm if all users are affected, or only some? Also, are there specific products or payment methods involved?
It seems to be affecting about 30% of checkouts, regardless of product. No clear pattern with payment method so far.
